Frame:Harm

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss Harm
Transcription
Description Scenario: negative impact to some entity, and the process that causes that harm
Closest FrameNet Frame(s)
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
Other aliases
Comments This is a high level domain, do not include LMs here.

This frame is used by: Experience_harm, Cause_harm, etc. Include LUs there.

Family Harm, Causation frames, Harmful encounters frames
Tags
Type Frame
Cultural Scope American English, Mexican Spanish
Cultural Information checked cultural scope for English and Spanish - Karie July 8 2014
Applicability English

Roles:

Role Name: harmed_entity
Role Type: Entity
Definition/Comments:
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: harmful_process
Role Type: Process
Definition/Comments: process that causes harm
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: effect_of_harm
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: damage caused by process
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: consequence_of_harm
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: results of damage, e.g. loss of function
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: cause
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: entity/situation that causes of harm
FrameNet Role:

Related Frames:

Current Frame: Harm
Relation Type: is subcase of
Related Frame: Causation
Roles:cause, causer, causal_process, affected, affected_process, effect, FD_relation_type
Comments:

Bindings:

harmful_process=Causation.cause
harmed_entity=Causation.affected
effect_of_harm=Causation.effect
cause=Causation.agent

Inferences

Description Outcome of harmful process is negative for the harmed_entity.
